description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2b, line 5. Physical description: 24 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Occasional staining. Origin: Original text completed on 11 Shawwāl 430 H [6 July 1039]; this copy, 1257 H [1841 or 1842] (leaf 114b). Incipit: الحمد لله حمد الشاکرين الذاكرين
author: Sharīf al-Murtaḍá, ʻAlam al-Hudá ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 966-1044 or 1045
extent: 116 leaves : paper ; 203 x 142 (152 x 95) mm bound to 203 x 144 mm
title: al-Dharīʻah ilá wuṣūl al-sharīʻah
creator: شريف المرتضى، علم الهدى علي بن الحسين، 966-1044 or 1045
subject: Islamic law—Interpretation and construction—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
